newsitem.title: USA: PECO Peach Bottom nuke boosting power-NRC.
newsitem.headline: PECO Peach Bottom nuke boosting power-NRC.

text.p: PECO Energy Co's 1,100 megawatt Peach Bottom nuclear power unit 2 was boosting power Friday, returning early from a scheduled maintenance and refueling outage, the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) said.
The Delta, Pa., unit was operating at 35 percent of capacity early Friday and "increasing power," the NRC said in its daily plant status report.
The unit was shut Sept 13 for refueling and maintenance and was originally expected to be out of service for 30 days.
PECO and Public Service Enterprise Group Inc each have 42.5 percent stakes in Peach Bottom, with Atlantic Energy Inc and Delmarva Power and Light Co each holding 7.5 percent.
-- Chris Reese, New York Power Desk 212-859-1627
